title: website: https://tip.golang.org/pkg/archive/tar/ shows no such directory
body:
Please see https://tip.golang.org/pkg/archive/tar/.

The web pages says:
File archive/tar
archive/tar
"/src/archive/tar" is not a directory

Screenshot:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/135652/15237884/38779e84-18a0-11e6-91fa-800945854452.png)

Not only archive/tar, a lot of other packages are broken too.

/cc @adg @bradfitz
